appName: VR Walk the Plank – Between the Towers
displayName: VR Walk the Plank – Between the Towers
display_name: VR Walk the Plank – Between the Towers
display_long_description:
This is not a sit-down VR show. This is real movement. Real fear. Real walking.
Step onto a virtual plank between cathedral towers. In just 2 seconds, your body reacts with real fear. No buttons. No joystick. Just you, your steps, and the drop beneath you.

It is not just another VR app; it's a revelation that takes you to unimaginable heights. Suspended between the towering spires of a majestic cathedral in a real-existing German cityscape, you'll confront your #fearofheights like never before. This app offers a truly unique challenge, setting it apart from the rest.

What truly sets #FightThePlank apart is its power to bring people together. It's more than a personal journey; it's a shared adventure that sparks wonder and curiosity in others. It's not just a game; it's an experience meant to be enjoyed with friends and acquaintances.

Perfect for social gatherings and events, #FightThePlank ignites interest and encourages group participation. Challenge yourself, prove your bravery, and relish the 'God Eye View' from the cathedral's pinnacle with breathtaking panoramic vistas.

The social dynamics of #FightThePlank are undeniable. Users are not only eager to share their adventures but also motivated to introduce others to this thrilling experience.

Share the joy with your friends and show their reactions. Capture these moments on film and spread the excitement on social media using #FightThePlank. It's not just an idea; it's a reality waiting to be explored! 

#VRtravelX
